website_summaries.verdict: The Nabi Headphones are a practical, economic, and wise way to combat hearing loss without taking the fun out of music for adults or kids.
pros: Powerful audio performance with deep bass and crisp highs
Tops out at 80dB for your kids
Easily to switch between parent and child mode?possibly without your kid knowing
cons: Inline remote has no playback or track navigation controls
Requires AAA battery to run in adult or kid mode?rechargeable option would have been nice

customer_reviews.title: practical and economical way to combat hearing loss
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these in July 2016 for $32.99, listed on the manufacturer's website as $69.99 and currently listed here at $99.99. Would not pay anymore than $32.99. Anything more is a rip off. At the price I paid, they are a practical and economical way to combat hearing loss in my child when he uses them on planes and on long drives as they are limited to 80dB on the kids setting, which lights up so you know what setting the little ones are using. With this in mind they have good audio performance with clear highs and deep bass. Another plus is the tangle-free cord. Downside is the requirement for a AAA battery.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Bob

customer_reviews.title: Lasted just over 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in June 2016. It's now October 2018 and they just recently broke last month. I'm not sure how that compares to other headphones, but we used these pretty regularly, not hard on them, so there you have it. They were really comfortable with good sound, and worked perfectly for my kids and myself (small adult).
customer_reviews.author: Cas

customer_reviews.title: Great quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great quality headphones. They come in a very nice package and include an extra cord. I appreciate the adult/child switch feature. You can tell these are very nice headphones and high quality materials. I got these for my 8 year old daughter and they are heavier than the ones I got for my 6 year old son but she doesn't mind the extra weight. The band makes them very comfortable and she likes the more "grown up" feel of these.
customer_reviews.author: Daniele Bryson

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for kids & adults w/great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quiet when the kids are using their Nabis at doctors appointments, etc to keep them occupied w/o disturbing others. Love the set volume & light up feature to protect their hearing. Great sound quality for kids & adults! If could add one option it would be bluetooth to avoid inevitable cord damage. Got these 1/3 less than the advertised RTV from Nabi-great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Basically Complicated

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We bought these headphones for a trip where our toddler would be on a plane for a long period of time. We wanted her to be able to watch movies on the ipad without disturbing others. These headphones are much better than cheaper kids' headphones, and we would purchase them again. I do wish they would adjust even smaller for a toddler head though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones for my 2 Year Old
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased a cheap pair of headphones for my son and didnt take long for the cord to get ripped out. These Nabi headphones look expensive, but were reasonable for about $50. Comes with 2 cords (I assume incase a kid loses one) and they're tangle free. They also unplug entirely from the headphones so my kid can't run aroumd with the cord dragging behind him. Parental switch to limit the volume and a cool battery operated light within/around the headphones, cool for seeing them in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: wine.wife

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality and we love the child safe mode. Now we just have to get our son to keep them on. Cord length is great and tangle free. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 weeks. Trying a new pair.
customer_reviews.text: Not Amazing. We had ours for about 3 weeks and they have already broken. We just returned and re bought them. The jack port on the actual circle ear piece would no longer hold the cable in it so the headphones were useless. Ill update in a few weeks after the new set arrives and we have a change to use them. As far as fit and sound quality when working, 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra C.

customer_reviews.title: Durable, great product for kids
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his headphones and uses them all of the time. They are truly noise cancelling because when he is wearing them he can never hear me lol
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted for my 8 yr old's birthday
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son's 8th birthday. They fit him perfectly and feel like they're well made, very sturdy. The quality of the sound is quite good (even according to my 14 year old son who has Beats). As a mom I love that they aren't loud enough to damage his hearing.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Cremeans

customer_reviews.title: Great look and sound
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, functionality, sound quality. Purchased for my 3 year old before our transcontinental flight. He loved them at home, but refused to wear them on the plane. Definitely more about being bored than not liking them. I'll use them if he doesn't!
customer_reviews.author: CR-Berkeley

customer_reviews.title: It works great, nice sounds and good for adult and kids ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought for Christmas gift to my niece, I also have another one for my daughter and bought accessory on ear side too. It works great, nice sounds and good for adult and kids and comfortable cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Drew .T

customer_reviews.title: They were great quality but I mis interpreted their description and thought ...
customer_reviews.text: They were great quality but I mis interpreted their description and thought they could also be used as noise cancelling and they are not
customer_reviews.author: Tara Norwood

customer_reviews.title: It's a very cool pair of headphones but after a year the fabric ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a very cool pair of headphones but after a year the fabric on the ear pads started peeling. I eventually took them off and I'm having a hard time replacing them for my son who is now without a pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too big for my three year old head. Set away for future use. Fancy box.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Better than Beats!
customer_reviews.text: My teen sons have super expensive Beats headphones. They were trying to lift these from their 5 year old sister. These headphones are of amazing quality.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic kids headphones
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic kids headphones. I really like the option to limit the volume level for my son. High quality, sound, and very sleek looking headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Daren

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality.  Possibly overkill for kids
customer_reviews.text: ..., but also probably cheaper in the long run (won't break/fall apart under kid use) Very well made, exceptionally well packaged (apple level of detail) and seem like they will withstand abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed, as I thought I would get a refund ...
customer_reviews.text: Headphones had a faulty jack. Returned for refund. Amazon issued an email stating refund was processed. Refund was applied to a gift card instead of going to my credit card as preferred. I'm disappointed, as I thought I would get a refund to my credit card.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H. Ellis II

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our airplane rides
customer_reviews.text: These are a must have accessory with my daughters Nabi. Perfect for our airplane rides. Thanks so much.
customer_reviews.author: 1 Sister 2 Sister

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars because the box was in poor condition. The box had obviously been used before ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything about these headphones exceeded my expectations! 4 stars because the box was in poor condition. The box had obviously been used before and was not new. Product is awesome despite the tattered box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my kids loved it.
customer_reviews.text: It's really designed for kids,in terms of the sound quality and the inner softness of the earphones makes you feel every bit of instrument used.my kids loved it.
customer_reviews.author: George Bosompem

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with great sound
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great, extremely comfortable and my son loves that they light up (8 y/o). Very nice...HIghly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: my son loves these, bought a couple years ago and they are still operational
customer_reviews.author: Anne O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Okay Headphones
customer_reviews.text: They are okay. I wish they were wireless and rechargeable instead of battery operated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, my daughter happily wears without getting sore ears like with her previous ones.
customer_reviews.author: Maksim Lin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product a little too quiet on a plane for me, however the plane we were on was quite loud. I thought my little man would take it off straight away but he loved them. Great build quality. Good size will grow with them it even fits my head at a stretch. The only negative is the price.
customer_reviews.author: Maxpower

customer_reviews.title: Great...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for my daughter. She loves them and so do we.
customer_reviews.author: E. Spruill

customer_reviews.title: GReat  for kids
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for my 4 year old. Perfect for his size head and able to make them bigger if needed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best for Kids. resistant and able to set volumn :-)
customer_reviews.author: Alex Molliex

customer_reviews.title: Identifying ring does not work
customer_reviews.text: The headphones look great and sound good but the glowing ring, which is why we purchased them, doesn't glow. I have tried different batteries and it just doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Clavinet.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set of headphones!! Great sound quality. I would buy them again for certain.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased about 10 different kinds of kids headphones and these are By FAR the best ones! Yes they cost a little more, but they are worth. I really tried kids gear, but they only last about 3 months before the cheap plastic hinge breaks. They have great customer service, but who wants to send them in every few months.
customer_reviews.author: robert d haseman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Sound is fabulous! Opened it this morning, so far so great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nora Mutalima

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my grandson & he love them, they are a gaming family, thanks,
customer_reviews.author: Judy Riley

customer_reviews.title: Since these headphones are advertised as "nabi" which is a ...
customer_reviews.text: Since these headphones are advertised as "nabi" which is a children's tablet product, I assumed these would be sized for children, and therefore I never checked. When we received them, they are sized for adults. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Porter

customer_reviews.title: Very satified
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my granddaughter, they are a bit too big for you head. But other than that she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Selina Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, nice-sounding, but bulky
customer_reviews.text: My 3-year-old loves these headphones. They sound good, and the volume limiting is effective. They are very cushy and comfortable. My caveats are that they are bulky and don't fold up. Not a problem at home, but I bought these almost exclusively for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Upstater

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love how these are made to protect my sons ears
customer_reviews.author: Alayna

customer_reviews.title: bought this for my 17 month old, for a ...
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my 17 month old, for a plane trip, hoping he would wear them, and he did. they just fit his head, and he is on the small side for a 17th month old. the only reason this got 4 stars is the child cord could not use on plane. The plane was to loud for him to hear so had to use the adult cord. but for home I can use the child cord,
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: Sad. They were really nice headphones
customer_reviews.text: Wires broke and the company did not compensate in any way. Sad. They were really nice headphones. Waste of $100.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell D.

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: The best headphones ever made. Sound is crystal clear and like velvet. Gave them to my grandson and he refuses to take them off.
customer_reviews.author: William Cooper

customer_reviews.title: I love them. They fit her just fine and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones for a trip for my daughter. I love them. They fit her just fine and I appreciate the volume control mechanisms for kids.
customer_reviews.author: KS80

customer_reviews.title: One ear works, one ear doesn't
customer_reviews.text: We tried again after the first ones didn't last and we have now had the same issue with these... audio stops working from one of the ears. very frustrating. We tried changing the battery and swapping cords... it works for a while then doesn't. Moving on to a new company.
customer_reviews.author: A Offerman-Celentano

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a gift to my friend's kid ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift to my friend's kid in Feb. I recently came to know that it was a defective piece and never really worked. The headphone jack couldn't be plugged into the earpiece. Reading all the reviews of the product, this seems to be an one-off defective piece and may be an issue with the seller. Just a heads up for anyone looking to buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for frequent use.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are very comfortable, they look and feel fantastic, and they sound pretty good. It has a very high quality build. But when the battery dies (which happens pretty quickly), they turn into expensive earmuffs. It's a bit frustrating that they waste battery lighting up your ears with thin white LED halos. It's a useless feature which becomes an annoying feature when used as night on an airplane. The max volume is louder than I'd like it to be for my kids and there's no way to adjust it. 3 stars for looking, feeling, and sounding good.
customer_reviews.author: MicronXD

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The batteries kept dying so quickly that my daughter lost interest in using them AND her dreamtab
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Kim

customer_reviews.title: Maybe just as good as Beats
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, and the build quality is really good. In "non-child" mode they sound just as good as Beats for a novice user and compared to the price of Beats....these win!
customer_reviews.author: Case

customer_reviews.title: Great kids headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are some pretty good quality headphones, which surprised me. I bought them mainly due to their volume limiting feature, but the quality of other Fuhu products we own extend to these as well. They come with 2 detachable plug wires, so you'll have a replacement when needed. Even the packaging is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: D R

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea, poor build.
customer_reviews.text: These look great and appear to be well built, but the 'parent mode' indicator light didn't work. Sound quality is great for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Dripping

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Me and my nephew really like this headphone. I recommend this to all kids or neither for adults. It's really good
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Durable enough for 3 and 6 year boys Great putchase
customer_reviews.author: cee gee

customer_reviews.title: The bigest waste of $100
customer_reviews.text: I expected to spend $100 for a great pair of headphones for my kids that won't brake. These are like any other kids headphones that you buy and wouldn't last too long. I have one child that barely uses them and when he does he can barely hear from them. My other child uses them all the time and the same situation. Don't spend the money on them...you might as well spend the extra money and get a pair of Beats for you kid.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Agudelo

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed with this product, all advertisements are misleading by not showing product being used with wire. Not one product photo shows the headphones as they would appear during actual use. Have to read complete product reviews to ensure they are not wireless. My son fell in love with them out of the box now we are stuck with headphones that are wired when we expected a wireless set. For this price I could have purchased a decent wireless set for my son to use.
customer_reviews.author: james

product_meta.title: nabi Headphones
product_meta.description: nabi headphones are the first dual mode headphones that deliver high definition and isolated listening experiences. It also gives you the peace of mind that your child's ears are safe with volume limiting technology (to 80db). These high performance headphones are engineered to deliver unmatched, high quality, pristine and balanced sound.
feature_bullets: DJ QUALITY - Experience superior sound quality with premium sound drivers that are professionally tuned for audio depth, sonic richness, and clarity of sound.

DUAL MODES WITH VOLUME LIMITING - Includes two listening modes: (1) nabi Mode - Volume is limited to a safe 80db for kids and (2) Parent Mode - Full listening experience with pristine high definition sound.
CUSTOMIZABLE - Customize nabi Headphones with KINABIs and Headphone Wraps of your kid's favorite characters and interests.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars100 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
